sentences.en: 'I will faithfully,'replied the man,'if you will come with me.
sentences.cn: “ 我会认真告诉你的, ” 那人回答, “ 如果你跟我走的话.

sentences.en: Ann faithfully promised never to tell my secret.
sentences.cn: 安信誓旦旦地保证决不把我的秘密说出去。

sentences.en: He always performs his duties faithfully.
sentences.cn: 他一贯忠实地履行自己的职责.

sentences.en: He had served the family faithfully for 40 years.
sentences.cn: 他已忠心耿耿地为这家人服务了40年。

sentences.en: He has served the farm faithfully for 20 years.
sentences.cn: 他为这个农场忠心耿耿地操劳了20年.

sentences.en: He was little more than a cipher who faithfully carried out the Fuehrer's commands.
sentences.cn: 他只不过是个走狗，忠实执行元首的命令。
我准确无误地抄下这封信.

sentences.en: I stayed faithfully by him until his comedy was finished.
sentences.cn: 我始终老老实实地陪着他,一直等他把这出滑稽戏演完.

sentences.en: Our country has always adhered faithfully to the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.
sentences.cn: 对于和平共处五项原则,我国一贯是恪守不渝的.

sentences.en: They attended faithfully to their duties.
They promised faithfully to bear their confinement with patience.
sentences.cn: 他们都老老实实的答应,要耐着性子忍受禁闭.

sentences.en: They swore an oath to carry out their duties faithfully.
sentences.cn: 他们宣誓忠实履行自己的职责.

sentences.en: We should devote ourselves assiduously and faithfully to the duties of our profession.
sentences.cn: 我们应当勤奋地而且忠诚地献身于我们的职责.

sentences.en: We took steps to ensure that rules should be faithfully carried.
sentences.cn: 我们采取了措施,以确保这些规章会不折不扣地得到贯彻.

sentences.en: When I adapt something I translate from one meaning to another as faithfully as I can.
sentences.cn: 我改编东西的时候，会尽可能忠实地将意思表达出来。
